ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:7453, CONF:10505 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.18"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="SPLY" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7451, R2.0=CONF:1098-7451)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7452, R2.0=CONF:1098-7452)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (Dispense Date) (CONF:7456, R2.0=CONF:1098-7456)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (Prescription Number) (CONF:7454, R2.0=CONF:1098-7454)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] repeatNumber (Fill Number) (CONF:7457)
In "EVN" (event) mood, the repeatNumber is the number of occurrences. For example, a repeatNumber of "3" in a dispense act means that the current dispensation is the 3rd (CONF: 16876)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Medication Fill Status 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.64 STATIC 1 (CONF:7455)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] quantity (Quantity Dispensed) (CONF:7458, R2.0=CONF:1098-7458)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship (Order Information) such that it (CONF:7473, CONF:7474, CONF:15606)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Medication Supply Order (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.17)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] performer such that it (CONF:7461, R2.0=CONF:1098-7461)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:7467, R2.0=CONF:1098-7467)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] addr (CONF:7468, R2.0=CONF:1098-7468)
supply act SHALL contain one product/Medication Information or one product/Immunization Medication Information template (CONF:15607, CONF:15608, CONF:9333)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="SPLY" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7451, R2.0=CONF:1098-7451)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7452, R2.0=CONF:1098-7452)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (Prescription Number) (CONF:7454, R2.0=CONF:1098-7454)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Medication Fill Status 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.64 STATIC 1 (CONF:7455)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (Dispense Date) (CONF:7456, R2.0=CONF:1098-7456)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] repeatNumber (Fill Number) (CONF:7457)
In "EVN" (event) mood, the repeatNumber is the number of occurrences. For example, a repeatNumber of "3" in a dispense act means that the current dispensation is the 3rd (CONF: 16876)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] quantity (Quantity Dispensed) (CONF:7458, R2.0=CONF:1098-7458)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship (Order Information) such that it (CONF:7473, CONF:7474, CONF:15606)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Medication Supply Order (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.17)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] performer such that it (CONF:7461, R2.0=CONF:1098-7461)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:7467, R2.0=CONF:1098-7467)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] addr (CONF:7468, R2.0=CONF:1098-7468)
supply act SHALL contain one product/Medication Information or one product/Immunization Medication Information template (CONF:15607, CONF:15608, CONF:9333)

body.codeblock: <supply xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="SPLY" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.18"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="2119061714"/> <text>Text Value</text> <effectiveTime value="20170828"/> <repeatNumber value="1"/> <quantity/> <performer> <assignedEntity> <id root="MDHT" extension="1188861556"/> </assignedEntity> </performer> <entryRelationship> <supply classCode="SPLY" moodCode="INT"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.17"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.17"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="585578969"/> <text>Text Value</text> <effectiveTime value="20170828"/> <repeatNumber value="1"/> <quantity/> <author/> <entryRelationship> <act classCode="ACT" moodCode="INT"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1427514922"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> </act> </entryRelationship> </supply> </entryRelationship> </supply>
